attributes.additional_details: With the changing of Prime Ministers within the past 6 weeks, the people of this country have had no choice as to who should stand and run for PM we are now therefore being led by a person chosen by their own colleagues, not the people.. This is not democratic and a General Election should be called for.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
